info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 13 at 4:47PM PDT until August 13 at 7:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... San Bernardino County in southern California... * Until 745 PM PDT. * At 447 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the the area near the intersection of Highway 95 and I-40 and also around Needles. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Needles, Highway 95 And I-40, Goffs Road FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
